name: Escape Challenge:Escape the red room games
name_original: Escape Challenge:Escape the red room games
description:
You woke up in a lovely beautiful fairy-tale room, came out of the noisy footsteps, what happened? You have to hurry out of this room to find out.

* Exquisite picture
* Clever digital puzzles
* From easy to difficult, suitable for all players
* Graphic Raiders
